public_policy.title: PUBLIC POLICY
public_policy.subtitle: Digital solutions for policymakers
public_policy.description: We provide local authorities, governments, and public administrations with next-generation statistical and IT tools that enable strategic decisions to be made in an informed and conscious way.
public_policy.intro: Our solutions, developed in scientific partnership with Quaeris, a renowned Italian research institute, enable public decision-makers to make informed decisions and plan government strategies thanks to greater knowledge and information.

citizen_satisfaction.title: Citizen Satisfaction:
citizen_satisfaction.intro: This is an evolving mapping over time of citizens' sentiment on specific topics of interest, segmented into homogeneous categories and divided by geographical area. Its application can be at the municipal, provincial, regional, or national level. In the case of specific topics (e.g., transport, healthcare, public services..), the analysis will be vertical and in-depth, while if there are no specific topics of interest, the analysis starts with a general screening divided by economic sectors and services defined together with the client. Thanks to the data collected, public decision-makers can increasingly understand the real opinions, positions, and needs of citizens and consequently make better political decisions.

quality_monitor.title: Quality Monitor:
quality_monitor.intro: Thanks to innovative custom-developed software, we help public, semi-public, and private companies understand their real daily impact on users. The system daily submits ad hoc questionnaires on satisfaction and service quality to all customers interacting with the client's offices, collecting detailed insights that automatically populate an interactive graphic dashboard. We replace with intelligent software the work usually done by an entire department of analysts. Thanks to the always up-to-date reports in real time, we support management in understanding the actual quality of the services provided, facilitating the comparison of companies in the same sector and between similar sectors using standard parameters.

microtargeting_ai.title: Microtargeting with Artificial Intelligence (AI)
microtargeting_ai.intro: This is a survey system that combines data analysis, social psychology, and artificial intelligence. It segments the population into extremely precise opinion groups and customizes promotional communication messages based on real values, emotions, and needs. While traditional surveys offer static numbers, microtargeting creates dynamic profiles, processing huge amounts of data in real time. The process starts with the collection of qualitative and quantitative data through: individual interviews or focus groups, open surveys, web listening (social, forums, search engines).. AI processes this data to identify recurring patterns: motivations, fears, common languages, and value references. From these patterns, 'opinion personas' are born, i.e., synthetic but realistic profiles representing different segments of the public. Example:
list: 'Marco, 42, pragmatic technician, distrustful of politics but sensitive to efficiency and merit.'
'Sara, 28, idealistic student, oriented towards sustainability and social justice.'
microtargeting_ai.intro1: Once the 'opinion personas' are defined, AI microtargeting allows you to: model different messages for each group, using language, values, and symbols that resonate with each identity, automatically test the emotional and cognitive response to content, optimize the dissemination of messages on the digital channels most frequented by each 'persona', and much more.. In short, AI microtargeting allows you to:
list1: reduce communication waste (speak only to those who are potentially interested);
obtain a higher return in terms of consensus, sales, or engagement.
